title: The accomplish'd courtier consisting of institutions and examples, by which courtiers and officers of state may square their transactions prudently, and in good order and method / by H.W. Gent.
author: Refuge, Eustache de, d. 1617.
notes: Translated into English by Edward Walsingham from a French manuscript copy of the second part of Trait√© de la cour, ou, Instruction des courtisans. The authorship of this work has generally been attributed to Sir Francis Walsingham, but the original was a French work by Eustache Du Refuge and was first published anonymously in Paris in 1617.  Cf. DNB and Brunet.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
